name: Spicy / Peppery
quickRead: Grounded body-calm, anti-'jitters,' pairs well with bright top notes
pairingTips: Add bright citrus (Limonene) for balanced uplift

name: Sweet / Candy / Tropical
quickRead: Uplifted mood/energy, 'sparkly' head; balance with BCP if anxious
budtenderLine: Sweet = Limonene/Ocimene/Terpinolene ‚Üí bright; add BCP to ground.
pairingTips: If customer feels anxious, pair with BCP for grounding

name: Sour / Citrus / Zest
quickRead: Crisp, upbeat; can feel racy for sensitive folks ‚Üí pair with BCP or Linalool
pairingTips: For sensitive customers, add BCP or Linalool to calm racy effects

name: Earthy / Musky / Herbal
budtenderLine: Earthy = Myrcene/Humulene ‚Üí heavier body, bedtime lane.
pairingTips: Add Pinene to reduce 'fog' if customer needs clarity

name: Floral
quickRead: Calm, soothing, 'exhale' vibes; nice evening option
pairingTips: Perfect for evening relaxation; pairs well with Myrcene for deeper calm

name: Pine / Forest
quickRead: Clearer head, focus; great to tame myrcene fog
budtenderLine: Pine = Pinene ‚Üí clarity; balances heavy profiles.
pairingTips: Use to add clarity to heavy/earthy profiles
